meanings.sent2: The gingerbreaded cookies were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The gingerbreaded decorations added a sweet touch to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her gingerbreaded outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The gingerbreaded walls of the bakery filled the air with a warm aroma.

meanings.definition: Made in the style of gingerbread.
meanings.sent1: The gingerbreaded house had intricate details.
meanings.sent2: She wore a gingerbreaded dress to the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The gingerbreaded artwork on the wall was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The gingerbreaded village display was a holiday favorite.
meanings.sent5: The gingerbreaded ornaments on the tree sparkled in the light.

meanings.definition: To decorate or embellish with gingerbread.
meanings.sent1: She gingerbreaded the cake with frosting and candies.
meanings.sent2: They gingerbreaded the gingerbread house with care.
meanings.sent3: He gingerbreaded the car with holiday lights for a festive look.
meanings.sent4: The chef gingerbreaded the dessert with artistic flair.
meanings.sent5: The children gingerbreaded the gingerbread man with colorful icing.
